content: {"name": "St. Paul's Lutheran Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Sign up on www.plentiful.com. Make sure you input your valid mobile number and an email address to be notified of any pantry closings.", "email": "", "url": "https://stpaulsbronx.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1891 McGraw Ave.", "address_2": "", "city": "Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10462", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.834682, "longitude": -73.862305}, "phones": [{"number": "(929) 445-0098", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}]}
